name: Christmas Gift Tracker | Notion Template
description: Christmas Gift Tracker Template | Christmas Gifts | Christmas Gift List | Notion Template | Notion | Holiday TemplateHappy Holidays! features: Christmas Gift Tracker Notion Template for anyone!; Two Synced Views so you can plan your Christmas shopping any way you'd like!; Fields to track Budget and Amount Spent for each gift recipient; Page to brainstorm gift ideas, list out items you want to purchase, and track the shipping information; How can I use the template? Use on your phone, tablet, or computer; Do I need a Notion account to use? Yes.; Can I edit the template? Yes! You can edit and customize the template as much as you want!
